entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Duncan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:44 PM PST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Cowichan 10:00 PM PST Thursday 23 February 2023
Temperature: -2.8°C
Humidity: 42 %
Wind Chill: -4
Dewpoint: -14.1°C
Wind: NNE 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday night: Clearing. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Wind light except northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 near the water. Low minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 23 February 2023
